file_content.text: I can confirm it: the defenses are down. Between those weapons and the armory, a lot of their killing power's out of their hands now.
Sith Intelligence hard at work, I see.
Hope you haven't had too much fun without me.
With a team of covert Jedi traipsing around Ziost, I figured you couldn't be far behind.
I've been expecting you....
Don't take another step. I'm warning you.
Stay where you are.
Look who it is. You're a sight for sore eyes.
[Flirt] A pleasant surprise....
Define "fun."
Yeah, right.
Perfect timing. We could use the help.
You made it. Good.
Thought I'd lost you. Nice to see I was wrong.
[Flirt] I was worried.
I didn't think we'd see you again.
You're alive!
This is a surprise....
The Emperor's Wrath--here, on Ziost. Now. What are the odds?
Some friendly advice if you're here to help the Emperor: I don't think he's paying.
Shouldn't you be in a Dark Council meeting or something? You know, debating and voting on what to do about the Emperor?
Vitiate is my responsibility. I'm taking care of it.
I'm ending this threat.
I no longer serve him. I think you know that.
Don't call me that.
There is no need--nor is there the time. Vitiate's progress must be stopped.
I'm ending this threat.
You clearly forget to whom you're speaking. Perhaps you would like a reminder?
Watch your tone.
I'm sure he'd ask for a volume discount, anyway.
I hear ya.
Oh, come on. You know I'm here for the same reason you are.
Take it easy, Commander. You know why I'm here.
You know this person?
Theron Shan, SIS.
More confident than I am, I'll tell you that.
Just making sure.
Glad to hear we're on the same page.
Hey. I'm on your side in this deal. You know I am.
Really. If you came here to save your Sixth Line, you're too late.
Uh... hi.
If you know what's going on here, Theron, then you know it has to stop. Let's work together.
Help us fix this, Theron.
I don't know what you could have been thinking. All you've done is give Vitiate more fuel for his fire.
You messed up, Theron.
That's enough, Agent.
Know your place, Kovach.
Second-guess me all you want, but that's not going to help us stop him.
Your guy's wrong. There has to be a way to stop the Emperor. Has to.
Sure. All we need to do is figure out how to knock out a guy no one can touch.
So I take it you don't have any ideas.
I do know we have to try something. That's about it. Way things are out there, I can't believe I even made it this far.
Soon as I crash-landed, the Emperor's puppets started coming for my shuttle, just like that. Maybe figured on some easy kills inside.
Did the only thing I could think of. Rigged the ship to overload, fry everything in and around it. Tried to shield myself but still scrambled half my implants.
And that stopped the attack.
They went down, yeah. Some of them got back up, but they seemed out of it. Not possessed--dazed.
Yeah. Circumstances aside....
Nice to be seen... but we've got work to do.
Sir... I thought it would be wise to disclose my role in all this, so I did. I hope that's all right.
Sure, of course. Saves us the trouble of play-acting our way into an alliance in front of someone we can trust.
You look a little worse for wear, Theron.
Tried to get here sooner, but, you know... met a little resistance on the way.
Yeah. Tell me about it. Way things are out there, I can't believe I even made it this far.
Oh. So you have a plan?
A plan? A plan would be great--but no, unfortunately, I don't know how to stop the most powerful being in the galaxy.
Intrusion. Vitiate's pawns.... I have a thought.
Be ready for anything....
That was... a nightmare.... What's...?
Is that what this was? Some kind of gutless Jedi mind trick?
I recognize you. You were plastered on every blaster target in the academy!
Go, get somewhere safe if you can.
Leave this place.
I'm willing to bet the targets never shot back.
You're in trouble. [Kill them]
Who...? Who are you people? What's going on here?
Go on, hit the trail. Do it.
Get out of here.
[Kill them]
It's you! My lord, I am.... I don't know what to say.
You don't have to say anything.
That's okay. [Kill them]
The Grand Champion--here? What's going on?
Just trying out a little experiment. You did great.
Nothing anymore. [Kill them]
Was that really necessary?
They would eventually become possessed again.
You've got a point, I guess.
That was cold....
That was the enemy. We are still at war.
And who's to say the Emperor wouldn't get around to possessing them again?
Leave. Now. You won't get a second chance.
Get out of here.
So now we know: shock them unconscious and the tie is severed--for a while, at least.
Hit enough of them hard enough and they'll be out a good, long while.
Yeah, but how do we do that?
I have some ideas. I need to consult the New Adasta municipal systems.
You going to need a hand with that? Some backup?
No. I'll be in touch.
Well, he seems confident. Is he any good?
Lana vouches for him.
Kovach has been amazing. I just wanted eyes and ears inside Sith Intelligence, and he gets himself saddled up next to Lana.
"Lana Beniko, Minister of Sith Intelligence." Who'd have thought it, right? When I met her on Manaan, she was in over her head. Seemed to be.
She's come a long way since then.
Lana's proven herself.
Yeah, I suppose you're right. I mean, what do I know, anyway?
She may be an enemy of the Republic, but you and I both know she'll stand with us against the Emperor.
Lana's proven herself.
I sure hope so. Ah, who am I to judge, anyway?
I know what you mean. She's not always what you'd call direct.
She's crafty, that Lana.
You don't have to tell me. My bruises still have bruises thanks to her little deception on Rishi. Still, who am I to talk?
[Say nothing]
I should never have sent my team here. I made a bad situation worse, and now--
And now I've got a priority holocall. Great.
You've been busy, Agent Shan.
Chancellor.
An off-the-books mission to Ziost. A secret team of Jedi that--I don't even know where to start with you about them--
Everything's happened so fast. You don't realize--
No, I do realize. I realize that you declined to inform me of a prime opportunity to cripple the Empire and face the Emperor head-on.
We're taking advantage of the chaos on Ziost, starting with New Adasta. I expect your cooperation.
Wait. Please, before you send the order--
You don't seem to understand, Agent Shan. There's nothing to argue.
Our ships are in orbit. The invasion's already begun.
I thought you'd be a fiery wreck on some mountainside.
I can't say I expected to find you here.
So he was the one in the stolen shuttle. You know him?
Should be able to start evacuation efforts as well. The fewer potential targets on Ziost, the better.
I see you've started the evacuation process already. Good. We need to get as many targets out of here as we can.
